fields.intro_text: Learn about our investment methodology and approach.
fields.process_overview: Our investment process combines ethical screening with disciplined portfolio construction.
fields.step1_content: Comprehensive values alignment: BDS-compliant, fossil fuel free, tobacco free, weapons free.
fields.step2_content: Hand-screening of companies to identify concerns beyond standard ESG ratings.
fields.step3_content: Disciplined diversification with concentration targets around 2% per holding.
fields.step4_content: Continuous research updates and client partnership in identifying new concerns.
